statements: SELECT * FROM BicycleMaintenance;
SELECT task_name, task_description, technician FROM BicycleMaintenance;
SELECT bicycle_id, scheduled_date, completed_date FROM BicycleMaintenance;
SELECT * FROM BicycleMaintenance WHERE scheduled_date >= '2022-10-01';
SELECT bicycle_id, task_name, technician FROM BicycleMaintenance WHERE technician = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM BicycleMaintenance WHERE technician = 'John Doe' ORDER BY scheduled_date DESC;
SELECT bicycle_id, task_name, completed_date FROM BicycleMaintenance WHERE task_name LIKE '%tune%' ORDER BY completed_date ASC;
SELECT id, task_name, technician FROM BicycleMaintenance WHERE completed_date > '2022-07-01' AND technician IN ('Alice Smith', 'Bob Johnson') ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM BicycleMaintenance WHERE task_description IS NOT NULL AND task_description <> '' ORDER BY bicycle_id, scheduled_date;
SELECT task_name, technician FROM BicycleMaintenance WHERE bicycle_id = 123 AND completed_date IS NULL ORDER BY technician, scheduled_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM BicycleMaintenance
SELECT id, maintenance_task, scheduled_date FROM BicycleMaintenance WHERE completed_date IS NULL
SELECT bike_id, maintenance_task, completed_date FROM BicycleMaintenance WHERE scheduled_date < '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM ServiceRecords ORDER BY service_date DESC
SELECT bike_id, SUM(cost) AS total_cost FROM ServiceRecords GROUP BY bike_id
SELECT * FROM BicycleMaintenance WHERE completed_date IS NOT NULL ORDER BY scheduled_date DESC;
SELECT maintenance_task, scheduled_date FROM BicycleMaintenance WHERE bike_id = 123;
SELECT mechanic_name, service_type, service_date FROM ServiceRecords WHERE service_date > '2022-01-01' AND cost > 100 ORDER BY service_date;
SELECT DISTINCT bike_id, service_type FROM ServiceRecords WHERE service_type LIKE 'Oil%' ORDER BY bike_id;
SELECT maintenance_task, scheduled_date, completed_date FROM BicycleMaintenance WHERE completed_date IS NULL AND maintenance_task LIKE '%tire%' ORDER BY scheduled_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule;
SELECT bicycle_id, maintenance_task FROM maintenance_schedule ORDER BY due_date DESC;
SELECT brand, model FROM bicycles WHERE purchase_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM service_records WHERE service_type = 'tune-up' AND service_date < '2023-06-01';
SELECT bicycle_id, service_type, service_date FROM service_records ORDER BY service_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE due_date > '2022-10-15';
SELECT bicycle_id, maintenance_task FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE bicycle_id = 3 ORDER BY due_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM service_records WHERE service_date BETWEEN '2022-09-01' AND '2022-09-30' AND service_type = 'Tune-up' ORDER BY record_id;
SELECT bicycle_id, brand, model, purchase_date FROM bicycles WHERE purchase_date < '2020-01-01' ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT bicycle_id, brand, last_service_date FROM bicycles WHERE brand LIKE '%Specialized%' OR brand LIKE '%Trek%' ORDER BY last_service_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM BicycleOwners;
SELECT owner_id, owner_name FROM BicycleOwners ORDER BY owner_id DESC;
SELECT model_name, manufacturer FROM BicycleModels WHERE manufacturer = 'Trek';
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM ServiceTasks WHERE task_name LIKE 'Oil%';
SELECT record_id, bicycle_id, service_date, technician_id FROM ServiceRecords WHERE bicycle_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM BicycleOwners;
SELECT owner_name, owner_id FROM BicycleOwners ORDER BY owner_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM BicycleModels WHERE manufacturer = 'Trek';
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM ServiceTasks WHERE task_id > 3 ORDER BY task_name ASC;
SELECT record_id, service_date FROM ServiceRecords WHERE technician_id IS NULL ORDER BY service_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM BicycleOwners;
SELECT owner_id, owner_name FROM BicycleOwners ORDER BY owner_name DESC;
SELECT owner_id, owner_email FROM BicycleOwners WHERE owner_id = 1;
SELECT bike_model, bike_color FROM Bicycles WHERE owner_id = 2 ORDER BY bike_model ASC;
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM MaintenanceTasks;
SELECT * FROM BicycleOwners;
SELECT owner_id, owner_email, owner_name FROM BicycleOwners ORDER BY owner_name DESC;
SELECT b.bike_model, b.bike_color, o.owner_name FROM Bicycles b JOIN BicycleOwners o ON b.owner_id = o.owner_id WHERE b.bike_color = 'Red';
SELECT s.record_id, s.service_date, s.service_description, b.bike_model FROM ServiceRecords s JOIN Bicycles b ON s.bike_id = b.bike_id WHERE s.service_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT m.task_name, m.task_description, t.assigned_worker FROM MaintenanceTasks m JOIN TaskAssignments t ON m.task_id = t.task_id WHERE t.assigned_worker LIKE '%Smith%';
